meaningMnemonic: You can <radical>eat</radical> all you want, but you'll still <radical>lack</radical> something to <kanji>drink</kanji>. You can't live just from eating, you have to drink things too!
readingMnemonic: You get desperate for a <kanji>drink</kanji> and put some <reading>no</reading>ri (の) seaweed in a blender, trying to create a drink of your own.
